posts.post_title: Looking for 2 Specific Old Judge Commons
posts.post_content:
I would like to acquire the two specific N172  player poses below.

Tug Arundel 13-4 (bat at ready, nearly vertical)
Patsy Cahill 61-2 (bat at ready, nearly vertical)

Send information regarding availability/condition/price to [url]kkkkandp@aol.com[/url]

Kevin Cummings
